movie.title: The Break-Up Artist
movie.description_intro: A woman who gets paid to break people up is forced to become a matchmaker when some new competition muscles her out of the break-up business. Now, in order to save her company (and keep her high-priced wardrobe) she'll have to rely on her old nemesis: love.
movie.description_full: A woman who gets paid to break people up is forced to become a matchmaker when some new competition muscles her out of the break-up business. Now, in order to save her company (and keep her high-priced wardrobe) she'll have to rely on her old nemesis: love.

movies.title: City of Women
movies.summary: Marcello is in the compartment of an Italian train, facing forward when the mineral water of the woman seated across from him starts to fall toward him. He catches the bottle and makes eye contact and follows her when she leaves the compartment. For a few moments she finds him attractive too. Then suddenly she gets off the train and starts walking through a field. Marcello follows her, loses her, finds himself in a large hotel surrounded by women. A feminist conference is taking place and he tries to escape.

movies.title: The Talent
movies.summary: Tri (Harry Lu) is the only son in a prestigious Cantonese-Vietnamese family in Saigon. Driving by the desire of following his late mother's path in the world of art, he decides to pursue the career of a music producer. This choice makes Tri conflict with his father's will. But familial regime is not the only thing Tri is up against. He's also setting out to create a star who solemnly moves the audience's heart by the power of the voice, not by the superficial bling the current showbiz is putting up. The appearance of Linh (Linh, Hoang Thuy), a promising but untrained singer, solidify Tri's dream in conquering the world with pure talent.

movies.title: The Man Who Knew Too Little
movies.title_english: The Man Who Knew Too Little
movies.title_long: The Man Who Knew Too Little (1997)
movies.summary: American Wallace Ritchie (Bill Murray) gets a ticket for an audience participation game in London, England, then gets involved in a case of mistaken identity. As an international plot unravels around him, he thinks it's all part of the act.
movies.description_full: American Wallace Ritchie (Bill Murray) gets a ticket for an audience participation game in London, England, then gets involved in a case of mistaken identity. As an international plot unravels around him, he thinks it's all part of the act.

movies.title: The Monster Squad
movies.summary: Dracula is alive. In fact, he plans to rule the world and that is why he seeks the help of other legendary monsters. However, a bunch of kids regarded by their peers as losers uncover the devious plan and prepare for a counter strike.
